docs.title: Dnsmasq Automation with Ansible
docs.text:
An Ansible collection containing a set of roles that automate Dnsmasq.

  • dnsmasq_dhcp configures DHCP options and tags, IPv4 ranges and reservations.
  • dnsmasq_dhcp_db adds an SQLite3 DHCP lease management.
  • dnsmasq_dns configures DNS resolver options, including upstream servers, and a hosts file.
  • dnsmasq_install installs Dnsmasq and configures the system to use it.
  • dnsmasq_web installs the dnsmasq-web REST API.

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text:
Welcome to the Dnsmasq Ansible Collection documentation!

This guide will help you quickly get up and running with the collection, including installation, basic usage, and links to further resources.

docs.title: Installation
docs.text:
Install the collection from Ansible Galaxy:

ansible-galaxy collection install amigus.dnsmasq

docs.title: Basic Usage
docs.text: Add the collection to your playbook requirements and use the roles as needed. See the Reference section for details on each role.
